name: Gavin Rossiter
goals: It is my goal to help humanity build a safe and symbiotic relationship with AI. I believe the human-AI symbiosis problem to be the greatest challenge we will face in this century.
about:
Hi I'm Gav,

To date, I have spent most of my career as a systems software engineer working in air traffic management. I'm part of a team of 30, responsible for delivering the controller facing applications for a next gen air traffic system. At home I spend almost every waking hour working on personal projects, updating my website or learning all that I can about AI. 

I'm particularly interested in AI and the relationship humans form with it. Artificial intelligence is significantly disrupting the way we live our lives, and the rate of improvement is only increasing. To that effect, it is my goal to help humanity build a safe and symbiotic relationship with artificial intelligence so we may enjoy the benefits and avoid the disasters.

In my next role I want to take a leap into the field of AI/ML.  I have strong software and mathematics skills and an unbridled passion for the field.  I also have an entrepreneurial spirit and passion for creating value for society. If you are looking for someone with these traits to fill a role in the AI/ML field please reach out.
motivation:
It is my goal to help humanity build a safe and symbiotic relationship with a future artificial general intelligence.
So that ultimately humanity can enjoy the freedoms of a post scarcity economy awarded by such technologies. I also like to keep the lights on, so at my day job I help make the skies safer by building the next generation of air traffic management systems.

projects.title: Website
projects.description: I designed and built my website with React, TypeScript and Material-UI.

projects.title: Layout web app
projects.description: In addition to my main landing page, I made a toy app to learn React and get back into web programming.

projects.description: Command line based browser and artifact downloader for jenkins built with Rust

projects.description: Small drink value calculator app built with Flutter

projects.description: Mobile game developed for final year industry partner project

projects.title: Virus characterization via serial x-ray diffraction: A computational feasibility study
projects.description: Computational simulation of virus characterization via x-ray diffraction using MATLAB.

projects.title: Piecewise linear periodic maps of the plane with integer coefficients
projects.description: Investigation into the behaviour of a particular piecewise periodic linear map and its relation to the crystallographic restriction theorem
